short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase/Decrease volume, listen on one channel(in speaker/headphones)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever thought of listening to a song only one side speaker ? 
Then this extension is for you which enables you to listen on one particular side of your headphone. 

You can also increase the volume.
